bug_report_001.Title/Summary: The trading platform page is opened by clicking buttons [Go to platform] and [Add to favourite] in any page of any trading instrument of menu section [Markets]

Steps_to_reproduce.str2: Click menu item [All markets / Forex / Indices / Cryptocurrencies (exept FCA) / Commodities / Shares]

bug_report_001.Expected_result: The page of the corresponding trading instrument on the trading platform is opened
bug_report_001.Actual_result: The trading platform page is opened
bug_report_001.Author: Mariia_Nevzorova
